NinjaCat.png.description: Game screenshot on coordinate grid. Corners are labeled as follows: bottom left (0,0), bottom right (640,0), top right (640,480), top left (0,480). On the grid there are 4 objects. NinjaCat is about 1/5 of the way up from the bottom and about 1/4 of the way in the from the left. The dog is about 1/5 of the way up from the bottom and 1/6 of the way in the from the right. The cloud is about 3/4 of the way up from the bottom and 1/4 of the way in from the left. The ruby is about 3/4 of the way up from the bottom and 1/6 of the way in from the right.
NinjaCat.png.source: Game character created for Bootstrap by Colleen Murphy
